00001 // RandomGenerator.h
00003 
00004 #ifndef RANDOMGENERATOR_H
00005 #define RANDOMGENERATOR_H
00006 
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 
00009 #include "SimulationEnvironment.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 #define MBIG 1000000000
00013 #define MSEED 161803398
00014 #define MZ 0
00015 #define FAC (1.0/MBIG)
00016 
00017 
00019 // RandomGenerator class definition
00020 // to encapsulate all the random number generators
00022 
00023 class RandomGenerator
00024 {
00025 public:
00026     static void reinit() {
00027         initialised_ = false;
00028     }
00029 //  static bool probability_trial_for_time_step(volatile double &);
00030     static bool probability_trial_for_time_step(const double &);
00031     static int iran(const int &);
00032     static double dran(const double &);
00033     static double gran(const double &);
00034 private:
00035     static double ran();
00036     static bool initialised_;
00037 };
00038 
00039 
00040 
00042 // RandomGenerator inline definition
00044 
00046 // generator
00047 // according to Knuth, any large MBIG, and any smaller (but still large) MSEED can be substituted for the above values
00048 // returns a uniform pseudo-random variate between 0 and 1.
00049 // set 'initialised' to false to reinitialize or reinitialize the sequence
00050 inline double RandomGenerator::ran()
00051 {
00052     // the value 56 (range ma_[1..55]) is special and should not be modified; see Knuth
00053     static int inext_, inextp_;
00054     static long ma_[56];
00055     long mj, mk;
00056     int i, ii, k;
00057     if (! initialised_) {
00058         // Initialization
00059         mj = fabs(MSEED - fabs(SimEnv::random_init_seed()));
00060         // Initialize ma_[55] using the seed idum and the large number MSEED
00061         mj %= MBIG;
00062         ma_[55] = mj;
00063         mk = 1;
00064         for (i = 1; i <= 54; ++i) {
00065             ii = (21 * i) % 55;
00066             ma_[ii] = mk;
00067             mk = mj - mk;
00068             if (mk < MZ) mk += MBIG;
00069             mj = ma_[ii];
00070         }
00071         for (k = 1; k <= 4; ++k)
00072             for (i = 1; i <= 55; ++i) {
00073                 ma_[i] -= ma_[1+(i+30) % 55];
00074                 if (ma_[i] < MZ) ma_[i] += MBIG;
00075             }
00076         inext_ = 0;
00077         inextp_ = 31;
00078         initialised_ = true;
00079     }
00080 
00081     if (++inext_ == 56) inext_ = 1;
00082     if (++inextp_ == 56) inextp_ = 1;
00083     mj = ma_[inext_] - ma_[inextp_];
00084     if (mj < MZ) mj += MBIG;
00085     ma_[inext_] = mj;
00086     return mj*FAC;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091 #undef MBIG
00092 #undef MSEED
00093 #undef MZ
00094 #undef FAC
00095 
00096 #endif // !defined(RANDOMGENERATOR_H)
